text: <a href="../1-Kings-4-1/" title="1 Kings 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
<a href="../1-Kings-4-2/" title="1 Kings 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And these *were* the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,
<a href="../1-Kings-4-3/" title="1 Kings 4:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
<a href="../1-Kings-4-4/" title="1 Kings 4:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada *was* over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar *were* the priests:

<a href="../1-Kings-4-5/" title="1 Kings 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And Azariah the son of Nathan *was* over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan *was* principal officer, *and* the king's friend:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-6/" title="1 Kings 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And Ahishar *was* over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda *was* over the tribute.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-7/" title="1 Kings 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.
<a href="../1-Kings-4-8/" title="1 Kings 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And these *are* their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-9/" title="1 Kings 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Bethshemesh, and Elonbethhanan:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-10/" title="1 Kings 4:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him *pertained* Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-11/" title="1 Kings 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

<a href="../1-Kings-4-12/" title="1 Kings 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Baana the son of Ahilud; *to him pertained* Taanach and Megiddo, and all Bethshean, which *is* by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Bethshean to Abelmeholah, *even* unto *the place that is* beyond Jokneam:

<a href="../1-Kings-4-13/" title="1 Kings 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 The son of Geber, in Ramothgilead; to him *pertained* the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which *are* in Gilead; to him *also pertained* the region of Argob, which *is* in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-14/" title="1 Kings 4:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Ahinadab the son of Iddo *had* Mahanaim:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-15/" title="1 Kings 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Ahimaaz *was* in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-16/" title="1 Kings 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Baanah the son of Hushai *was* in Asher and in Aloth:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-17/" title="1 Kings 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:
<a href="../1-Kings-4-18/" title="1 Kings 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:

<a href="../1-Kings-4-19/" title="1 Kings 4:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 Geber the son of Uri *was* in the country of Gilead, *in* the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and *he was* the only officer which *was* in the land.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-20/" title="1 Kings 4:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 Judah and Israel *were* many, as the sand which *is* by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-21/" title="1 Kings 4:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-22/" title="1 Kings 4:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And Solomon's provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,

<a href="../1-Kings-4-23/" title="1 Kings 4:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-24/" title="1 Kings 4:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 For he had dominion over all *the region* on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-25/" title="1 Kings 4:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beersheba, all the days of Solomon.
<a href="../1-Kings-4-26/" title="1 Kings 4:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-27/" title="1 Kings 4:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon's table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-28/" title="1 Kings 4:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where *the officers* were, every man according to his charge.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-29/" title="1 Kings 4:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that *is* on the sea shore.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-30/" title="1 Kings 4:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 And Solomon's wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-31/" title="1 Kings 4:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
<a href="../1-Kings-4-32/" title="1 Kings 4:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-33/" title="1 Kings 4:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that *is* in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.

<a href="../1-Kings-4-34/" title="1 Kings 4:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
